system.description: When you watch someone's back and keep your eyes peeled, you can roll to @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.h7JpSHtXSQYIjsWA]{Overcome} any harm against them with +Sense instead of +Blood.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
Choose one:

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.ZrHnVfT943zF7FnE]{Pay the Price} to take the 10+ result, or create a temporary solution. A temporary solution will delay the threat, but when time is up, it'll be back in force - the Overlord will tell you when.

success.label: Success!
success.value: You stop the obstacle, threat, Cut, or Move from causing harm.
